00017 // Maintains sign information about live variables. If a given variable may be either positive or negative, this object becomes top.
00018 // There is one SgnLattice object for every variable
00019 class SgnLattice : public FiniteLattice
00020 {
00021         public:
00022                 
00023         // The different levels of this lattice
00024         typedef enum{
00025                 // this object is uninitialized
00026                 uninitialized, 
00027                 // no information is known about the value of the variable
00028                 bottom, 
00029                 // this variable is = 0
00030                 eqZero, 
00031                 // the sign of the variable is known
00032                 sgnKnown, 
00033                 // this variable can be either positive or negative
00034                 top} sgnLevels;
00035                 
00036         // The different states of this lattice (in level sgnKnown)
00037         typedef enum{
00038                 // This variable's state is unknown
00039                 unknown, 
00040                 // This variable is positive or =zero
00041                 posZero, 
00042                 // This variable is negative or =zero
00043                 negZero} sgnStates;
00044         
00045         private:
00046         
00047         sgnStates sgnState;
00048         
00049         private:
00050         // this object's current level in the lattice: (uninitialized, bottom, sgnKnown, top)
00051         sgnLevels level;
00052         
00053         public:
00054         
00055         SgnLattice()
00056         {
00057                 sgnState = unknown;
00058                 level=uninitialized;
00059         }
00060         
00061         SgnLattice(const SgnLattice& that)
00062         {
00063                 this->sgnState = that.sgnState;
00064                 this->level = that.level;
00065         }
00066         
00067         SgnLattice(long val)
00068         {
00069                 if(val == 0)
00070                         this->level = eqZero;
00071                 else {
00072                         this->level = sgnKnown;
00073                         if(val > 0) this->sgnState = posZero;
00074                         else        this->sgnState = negZero;
00075                 }
00076         }
00077         
00078         // Ensures that the state of this lattice is initialized
00079         void initialize()
00080         {
00081                 if(level == uninitialized)
00082                 {
00083                         sgnState=unknown;
00084                         level=bottom;
00085                 }
00086         }
00087         
00088         // returns a copy of this lattice
00089         Lattice* copy() const;
00090         
00091         // overwrites the state of this Lattice with that of that Lattice
00092         void copy(Lattice* that);
00093         
00094         // overwrites the state of this Lattice with that of that Lattice
00095         // returns true if this causes this lattice to change and false otherwise
00096         bool copyMod(Lattice* that_arg);
00097         
00098         // computes the meet of this and that and saves the result in this
00099         // returns true if this causes this to change and false otherwise
00100         bool meetUpdate(Lattice* that);
00101         
00102         bool operator==(Lattice* that);
00103         
00104         // returns the current state of this object
00105         sgnStates getSgnState() const;
00106         sgnLevels getLevel() const;
00107         
00108         // Sets the state of this lattice to bottom
00109         // returns true if this causes the lattice's state to change, false otherwise
00110         bool setBot();
00111         
00112         // Sets the state of this lattice to eqZero.
00113         // returns true if this causes the lattice's state to change, false otherwise
00114         bool setEqZero();
00115         
00116         // Sets the state of this lattice to sgnKnown, with the given sign.
00117         // returns true if this causes the lattice's state to change, false otherwise
00118         bool setSgnKnown(sgnStates sgnState);
00119         
00120         // Sets the state of this lattice to sgnKnown, with the sign of the given value.
00121         // returns true if this causes the lattice's state to change, false otherwise
00122         bool set(int val);
00123         
00124         // Sets the state of this lattice to top
00125         // returns true if this causes the lattice's state to change, false otherwise
00126         bool setTop();
00127         
00128         // Increments the state of this object by increment
00129         // returns true if this causes the lattice's state to change, false otherwise
00130         bool plus(long increment);
00131         
00132         // Increments the state of this object by the contents of that
00133         // returns true if this causes the lattice's state to change, false otherwise
00134         bool plus(const SgnLattice& that);
00135         
00136         // Decrements the state of this object by increment
00137         // returns true if this causes the lattice's state to change, false otherwise
00138         bool minus(long increment);
00139         
00140         // Decrements the state of this object by the contents of that
00141         // returns true if this causes the lattice's state to change, false otherwise
00142         bool minus(const SgnLattice& that);
00143         
00144         // Negates the state of the object
00145         // returns true if this causes the lattice's state to change, false otherwise
00146         bool negate();
00147         
00148         // Multiplies and/or divides the state of this object by value
00149         // returns true if this causes the lattice's state to change, false otherwise
00150         bool multdiv(long multiplier);
00151         
00152         // Multiplies and/or divides the state of this object by the contents of that
00153         // returns true if this causes the lattice's state to change, false otherwise
00154         bool multdiv(const SgnLattice& that);
00155         
00156         // Applies a generic complex operation to this and that objects, storing the results in this object
00157         // returns true if this causes the lattice's state to change, false otherwise
00158         bool complexOp(const SgnLattice& that);
00159                 
00160         string str(string indent="");
00161 };
